video.title: Peep and the Big Wide World
video.synopsis: In this animated series that offers basic science lessons to preschoolers, Peep the baby chick uncovers many useful facts he shares with viewers.

episodes.synopsis: Peep helps Chirp build a nest. / Quack gets stuck in a log, and Peep and Chirp consult different animals for ideas on how to get him out.
episodes.title: Chirp Builds a Nest / Stuck Duck

episodes.synopsis: Peep and Quack find a duck decoy. / On a windy fall day, Peep spots the perfect red-and-gold leaf; the birds chase it as the wind blows it around.
episodes.title: The Real Decoy / Peep's Lost Leaf

episodes.synopsis: Peep finds a purple feather, and the birds search for its owner. / The birds are excited to see snow for the first time; Quack builds a snow duck.
episodes.title: Birds of a Feather / The Incredible Shrinking Duck

episodes.synopsis: Peep and Chirp follow their shadows all day to find out where the sun goes at night. / Chirp uses Peep and Quack as counter balance on a ramp.
episodes.title: Go West Young Peep / A Delicate Balance

episodes.synopsis: Quack's stories of the world cause little Red Fish to start a museum. / Peep follows Squeak out into the night and meets fireflies, bats and a snail.
episodes.title: The Fish Museum / Peep's Night Out

episodes.synopsis: Quack sets out to prove that his pond is bigger than another pond. / Newton gets stuck upside down, and the birds figure out how to turn him around.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home / Flipping Newton

episodes.synopsis: Chirp decides to study other birds to figure out how to fly. / The birds find a mirror in the dump, and Quack can't pry himself away from his image.
episodes.title: Chirp's Flight Program / Mirror, Mirror in the Dump

episodes.synopsis: Quack is so excited to see a baby robin hatching that he searches for an egg of his own. / Raccoon promises to show the birds the coolest thing ever.
episodes.title: Quack Hatches an Egg / The Whatchamacallit

episodes.synopsis: Quack wants Beaver Boy to come and visit his pond, but Quack's directions leave something to be desired. / Peep befriends a caterpillar.
episodes.title: Wandering Beaver / Peep's New Friend

episodes.synopsis: Quack finally transports Peep and Chirp to Green Island, and the birds fear this is their last adventure. / An annoying sound is bothering Quack.
episodes.title: The Trip to Green Island / Give Me a Call

episodes.synopsis: Quack finds a slice of bread and considers whether to save it. / Quack has another sleepless night.
episodes.title: Finders, Keepers / Quack Quiets the Universe

episodes.synopsis: Peep accidentally sets sail in the Good Ship Easter Egg. But Peep is alone! How can he get out now? / The birds experiment with a pair of sunglasses.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Thing That Went and Came Back / Peep's Color Quest

episodes.synopsis: Chirp's interest in collecting becomes a mania. / Quack decides to give a concert.
episodes.title: Chirp Sorts It Out (Sort Of) / Hear Here

episodes.synopsis: The birds consider the difference between ducks and beavers. / Chirp discovers a pink cherry orchard.
episodes.title: Snow Daze / Flower Shower

episodes.synopsis: The birds wake up to find the world is gray and everything in it is gone. Chirp knows that it's actually a foggy day. / The birds experiment with mud.
episodes.title: Who Stole the Big Wide World? / M-U-D Spells Trouble

episodes.synopsis: The birds meet another Quack. Megan Mullally guest stars as Quack #2. / Another duck tries to move into Quack's pond.
episodes.title: Quack Quack / One Duck Too Many

episodes.synopsis: Peep searches for his favorite (lost) dandelion seed, and finds the world is full of sticky things. / Beaver Boy is ready to cut down his first tree.
episodes.title: Stick with Me / Tree Feller

episodes.synopsis: The birds learn more about collecting. / The birds discover you can make prints with berry juice.
episodes.title: Count Them Out / Peep Prints

episodes.synopsis: Chirp tries to find a way to fly across Quack's pond. / Quack discovers bubbles, but no one believes him.
episodes.title: A Daring Duck / The Trouble with Bubbles

episodes.synopsis: Quack decides not to talk until Chirp begs him to. (This is going to take a very looong time.
episodes.title: The Sounds of Silence, Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Beaver Boy is distraught over losing tooth. ("Can you still be a beaver with only one tooth?") / Quack's pond is covered with ice.
episodes.title: The Tooth, the Whole Tooth and Nothing But the Tooth / The Winter of Quack's Discontent

episodes.synopsis: Chirp finds a golden string, and she and Quack get tied together. / Wishing on a star only works if your star hasn't contracted "staritis."
episodes.title: In a Bind / Star Light, Star Bright

episodes.synopsis: The birds tell stories about the day they were born. / The birds become lost in the Deep Dark Woods.
episodes.title: Bedtime Story / The Deep Duck Woods

episodes.synopsis: Beaver Boy has cut down too many trees. The solution? Grow more trees! But Beaver Boy discovers that growing trees takes a long time.
episodes.title: An Inconvenient Tooth, Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: The birds help a young groundhog find her shadow. / Quack needs some attention (shocking!), and decides to throw a party to get some.
episodes.title: Bringing Spring / Quack's Pond Party

episodes.synopsis: Peep and Quack look for lost bunnies. / Quack's losing his feathers, but just how many (is too many)?
episodes.title: You Can Count on Bunnies / Falling Feathers
